Name: Royal Horse - Platinum
Description:
Activates Mount: Royal Horse - Platinum

You can also take it to Callista in the Meowlux Member Store on the 2nd floor of the mall near the Development Bureau for recycling and exchange for a certain amount of Meowlux Premium Cards.
